  .. index:: 
     single: RO_0002328; functionally related to
     single: functionally related to; RO_0002328

RO_0002328 - functionally related to
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for functionally related to

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    A grouping relationship for any relationship directly involving a function, or that holds because of a function of one of the related entities.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
